This website from Mount Sinai in New York provides valuable information on chest pain, including considerations, causes, home care tips, when to contact a medical professional, and what to expect during an office visit. It covers various causes of chest pain beyond heart-related issues, such as pneumonia, asthma, and muscle strains. The page emphasizes the importance of seeking medical help if experiencing specific symptoms like shortness of breath, dizziness, or worsening pain. If you have concerns about chest pain, this website can guide you on when to seek help.
